item.description:
Last month we had a small but mighty kickoff meeting.  Although we started with general discussion, the size of the group allowed us to give specialized focus on two client sites. 

As soon as we develop a good core group we'll be scheduling:

  • Presentations
  • Technical issues and resources discussions
  • Exploring new plugins and techniques
  • Comparing CMS tools
  • Showing off our designs
  • Sharing ideas to get more projects/customers

Now accepting ideas for topics and scheduling presenters.  If you have the expertise of interest to the group, we'll let you strut your stuff. 

Open to WordPress developers and WordPress Website or blog owners.
item.how_to_find_us: 1st floor office. No need to feed the meter - parking is free after 5:30 pm.

group.name: Manchester, NH WordPress Developers and Users

item.name: WordPress Themes Discussion
